message: Koujaku leaves to go talk to his gang, so I head over to Mizuki's shop.
Hm? A message.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Spam?"

The subject says "Please save me."
The sender is "Damsel in Distress."
...Damsel in Distress?
I could swear I got a spam message earlier with the same name.

name: 蒼葉
message: "And delete."
Hm? Another message.

The same message again.
...Delete.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the..."
They just kept coming. What the hell?
I quickly open my bag and wake up Ren.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "My Coil's acting up. What is this? Some kinda virus?"

name: 蓮
message: "One moment, please. I'll look into it."
Ren falls silent.
While I wait, the mails keep coming.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Anything?"

name: 蓮
message: "Analysis complete. It's not a virus. I have taken measures, on the off chance that my analysis was incorrect."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So there's no way to stop these messages from coming in?"

name: 蓮
message: "The sender's address is unknown."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell?!"

name: 蓮
message: "Perhaps you should try opening one, just in case."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You sure about that?"
But I get the feeling the messages will just keep coming if I ignore them. The notification chime is starting to drive me nuts.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Fine, I get it! You win!"
Desperate for relief, I open one of the messages.
...Huh?
They stopped.
How is that possible?
Puzzled, I turn my eyes to the text.
But the message is empty. So it really was just spam?
My Coil chimes again. Only this time, it isn't a message.

name: 蓮
message: "It's a game download."

name: 蒼葉
message: "A game download... Oh."
That's right, the game I played the other day. I guess this is the next chapter?
When the download finishes, the title screen appears.
Yeah, it's the same game.
There's no start button. How is this supposed to work?
A few seconds later, the screen changes and the game suddenly starts up.
I try pushing the keys on my Coil, but I can't move.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren, I don't think it's working."

name: 蓮
message: "Maybe it's a non-playable demo?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "A demo? What's the point of sending that out?"
I jab at the controls for a while. Finally, the main character starts to move.
Is it working now?
But when I take my fingers off the keys, the character keeps moving on its own.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What the?"
The game ends abruptly. I guess it really is just a demo.
What was the point of sending this out? Was it a mistake?
It doesn't make sense.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I have no idea what kind of game that was supposed to be."

name: 蓮
message: "I see."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I was right. It was just spam. What a waste of time. Let's go home."
I close the game and start back toward home.
